name: FastCSV-ext
shortDescription: Supercharge PHP CSV processing with 3.6‚Äì4.8x faster performance and lower memory usage.
keyFeatures: 3.6‚Äì4.8x faster than PHP CSV using SPLFileObject

name: FastCSV-C
shortDescription: A blazing-fast, dependency-free C library for CSV parsing and writing at scale.
description: A standalone, high-performance C library for CSV processing with minimal memory footprint.

name: PHP-CSVHelper
shortDescription: Modern PHP library with unified API and automatic performance boost.
keyFeatures: Auto-uses FastCSV extension for efficiency and fallback to SplFileObject for reliability
description: A modern PHP library that provides a unified interface for CSV processing, automatically using FastCSV when available.
features: Intelligent Performance: Automatically uses FastCSV (3.6-4.8x faster) when available
Reliable Fallback: Falls back to optimized SplFileObject implementation
Memory Efficient: Constant memory usage with streaming for datasets of any size
